Alex Lindsay String Orchestra (New Zealand) 阿列克斯·林德希管弦乐队（新西兰）

sameAnalysis.word_list: also, too, as well, either, likewise
means: also ：比too正式一些，语气较重，只用于肯定句，一般紧靠动词。
too ：语气较轻，多用于口语，在肯定句中使用，通常位于句末。
as well ：一般不用否定句，通常放在句末，强调时可放在句中。
either ：用于否定句，放在句末，之前加逗号。

sentence.Network_en: Surfing the Internet is fun, but it's also a time waster.
sentence.Network_cn: 上网很有意思，但也很浪费时间。

sentence.Network_en: They also left a card, imprinted with the name Sean Lynch.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们还留下了一张名片，上面印着肖恩·林奇的名字。

sentence.Network_en: Once wholesale prices are deregulated, consumer prices will also rise.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦批发价格放开，零售价格也会随之上涨。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  alswā 'quite so, in that manner, similarly' (see all, so)

encyclopedia.content: 英文单词also,既可以作为副词又可以作为连词用，作为副词是“也”的意思，作为连词，是“又”的意思，用法非常常见。

entry.def: You can use also to give more information about a person or thing, or to add another relevant fact.

example.ex: It is the work of Ivor Roberts-Jones, who also produced the statue of Churchill in Parliament Square...
example.tran: 这是艾弗·罗伯茨-琼斯的作品，他还创作了议会广场上的丘吉尔塑像。

example.ex: He is an asthmatic who was also anaemic...
example.tran: 他是个曾患贫血症的哮喘患者。

entry.def: You can use also to indicate that something you have just said about one person or thing is true of another person or thing.

example.ex: His father, also a top-ranking officer, had perished during the war...
example.tran: 他的父亲，也是位高级军官，在战争中牺牲了。

example.ex: We have been working very hard, and our families have also worked hard...
example.tran: 我们一直很努力工作，并且我们的家人也是如此。

stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+most最多→adv.几乎, 差不多
al全部+ready准备→全部准备好了
al全部+so如此→全部如此→也,同样

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+together共同, 一起→adv.完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
al加强+though虽然→conj.虽然, 尽管

means.word_mean: 也, 同样, 并且，此外

sentences.en: You'll have to get a passport, and you'll also need a visa.
sentences.cn: 你必须申办护照, 同时还需要有签证。

sentences.en: I am also writing a short story.
She not only plays well, but also writes music.
sentences.cn: 她不仅很会演奏, 而且还会作曲。

jushi.english: I also added a number of new experiments.
jushi.chinese: 我又增加了许多新的试验项目。

jushi.english: The guest tried to stand the egg on end, but in vain.Also，no other guest could make the egg stand on end.
jushi.chinese: 那位客人试图把鸡蛋立起来，但没有成功。同样，别的客人也没有一个能把鸡蛋直立起来。

jushi.english: I'm cold, and I'm also hungry and tired.
